Notice

This event has been released in the Global server and its relevant stories and operations are now available in the Archives and Terminal, respectively. As such, the contents of this page and the related subpages have been archived.

Ending a Grand Overture is the seventh Intermezzo in Arknights.

Outfits[edit]

The following outfits are available in the Outfit Store:

New
Re-edition
Additional information:
  • The Other Side of Siracusa is available from April 15, 2025 to April 29, 2025.
  • All old outfits except Divine Oath, Hand of Destiny, Like Illusion, Mirror Visitor, Priory of Abyss, The Bard's Tale, and Trust Your Eyes are available from April 15, 2025 to May 13, 2025.

Furniture[edit]

The Londinium Railway Platform furniture theme is available; some of its parts are awarded from Pending Bills missions while others are available in the Office of Proposed Resolutions and Furniture Store.

Miscellaneous[edit]

  • New Main Theme operations: S9-3 and S9-4.
  • The skill and Operator Module used by the Support Unit can now be changed at the player's discretion.
  • Record Restoration added for Il Siracusano in April 15, 2025.
  • [Global] The Sanity cap is increased by 45, thus players at the maximum level of 120 will have a cap of 180 , and the Sanity restored through Originite Prime is changed to 135 regardless of player level.
  • [Global] The Rhodes Island Infrastructure Complex receive a major overhaul to the interface, including the function to set queues and multiple shifts.
  • Certain upgrade materials' operation clear requirements have been changed:
    • Crystalline Electronic Unit: Clear S4-10 for the first time
    • Nucleic Crystal Sinter: Clear S9-2 for the first time
    • Solidified Fiber Board: Clear S9-3 for the first time
    • Cyclicene Prefab: Clear S9-4 for the first time
  • [Global] Elemental Damage is now renamed to Elemental Injury to avoid confusion with Elemental damage.
  • In-App Purchase section now have categories related to packs sold in-game.
  • [Global] Anti-aliasing is now added; because of this, the hardware requirements for Arknights have been increased to the following:
    • Minimum
      • Android: Snapdragon 845/Dimensity 800/Kirin 820 or better, 4GB+ RAM
      • IOS: A11, 3GB RAM, iPhone X or better
    • Recommended
      • Android: Snapdragon 865/Dimensity 1200/Kirin 990 or better, 6GB+ RAM
      • IOS: A13, 4GB RAM, iPhone 11 or better

Operator Records/Paradox Simulations[edit]

New Operator Records/Paradox Simulations are added for the following Operators:

English CVs[edit]

[Global] English CVs added for the following Operators:

Operator CV

Miguel Ferreño
Akira Lee Watanabe
Maddie Matsumoto
Cassandra Lee Morris

Media[edit]

Trivia[edit]

  • Once upon a Time operations are arranged to form a crown.
  • Ending a Grand Overture has the following distinctions:
    • It is the first Intermezzo/Side Story without its own OST; the music used as the event's BGM are instead included in Arknights OST 5.
    • It is the fourth Intermezzo without special operations after Darknights Memoir, A Walk in the Dust and Under Tides.
